#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
inline int getn(){
register int n=0, c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,a,b,x,y,count;
	t=getn();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=getn();
		a=getn();b=getn();
		count=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			x=getn();y=getn();
			count=count+abs(a-x)+abs(b-y);
		}
		cout<<2*count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
